item.title: 1 in 3 U.S. Workers Say They’ve Had Romances With Their Managers
item.description: The Coldplay concert kiss cam scandal that led to the resignation of a tech startup CEO highlights a common workplace issue – but smooching a supervis...

item.title: If Your Business Uses These Versions of Microsoft SharePoint, Patch Them Now
item.description: The zero-day attack is serious, but fixes are available now for some versions of the software.

item.title: Frustrated Employees Can Hurt Your Business. Here’s How to Fix It
item.description: Nearly half of employees responding to a new survey said their managers didn’t understand how they worked or what they contributed to the business.

item.title: Dolphins in Shark Bay Are Using an Innovative Fishing Technique
item.description: Innovation isn’t limited to the human species. Dolphins in Shark Bay, Australia have been observed using a special technique to hunt fish.

item.title: CaaStle Founder Christine Hunsicker Charged With $300M in Fraud Case
item.description: The “clothing as a service” business raised $534 million since its 2011 launch.
